Epanechnikov kernel

depa.Rd

Epanechnikov kernel

Usage

depa(xx, loc = 0, scale = 1)

Arguments

xx

the evaluation points.

loc

the location parameter (normalized to be 0).

scale

the scale parameter (normalized to be 1).

Value

values.

Examples

depa(0)
#> [1] 0.75
depa(seq(-1,1,by=0.05))
#>  [1] 0.000000 0.073125 0.142500 0.208125 0.270000 0.328125 0.382500 0.433125
#>  [9] 0.480000 0.523125 0.562500 0.598125 0.630000 0.658125 0.682500 0.703125
#> [17] 0.720000 0.733125 0.742500 0.748125 0.750000 0.748125 0.742500 0.733125
#> [25] 0.720000 0.703125 0.682500 0.658125 0.630000 0.598125 0.562500 0.523125
#> [33] 0.480000 0.433125 0.382500 0.328125 0.270000 0.208125 0.142500 0.073125
#> [41] 0.000000
